lead_paragraph: Saturday’s announcement by the Russian Olympic Committee signaled that about 40 percent of the athletes accused of having doped at the past two Summer Games are Russian.

headline.main: Eight Russians Flunk Doping Tests in New Look at 2012 London Samples

snippet: Saturday’s announcement by the Russian Olympic Committee signaled that about 40 percent of the athletes accused of having doped at the past two Summer Games are Russian.
abstract: Russia's Olympic Committee announces that eight of its athletes that competed in 2012 Olympics tested positive for banned substances in recent re-examination of their doping samples, signaling that about 40 percent of athletes accused of having doped at 2012 and 2008 Olympics are Russian.
